Description: This Bernie Rico Jr. Jekyll 727 is a neck-through 7-string that will spoil you forever. This is the top level of USA handmade guitar craftsmanship. It plays like a dream with a super smooth maple neck and easy access to all 27 frets with the neck-through construction. It is set up perfectly with low action, accurate intonation, and incredible tuning stability even when abusing the Floyd. I just cleaned it up and put fresh new Ernie Ball cobalt strings and 9V battery, so it is totally ready to rock!This guitar was custom made for me in 2009 and has been my main guitar for about a decade now. I actually hand-picked the birdseye maple fretboard and quilted maple top out of the collection in Bernie's shop (see the last photo of Bernie and I). I actually wrote about it and took progress photos on sevenstring.org back in the day: http://www.sevenstring.org/threads/incredible-bernie-rico-jr-custom-jekyll-7-string-experience-lots-of-pics.90829/ While the images will show some of the small dings and signs of use, I take pride in keeping my instruments in excellent working and physical condition. It has been rock-solid for gigging and recording, primarily with my metal band Sorizon. Sadly, I must let it go for financial reasons.The guitar includes a hardshell case, the original metal neck pickup mount and screws, some new black knobs, allen wrenches, extra Floyd spring, and case keys. See below for specs and upgrades...Construction: Neck-throughNeck: MapleFretboard: Birdseye MapleBody: Mahogany WingsFrets: 27Scale Length: 25.5Pickup: Fishman Fluence ModernBridge: Original Floyd Rose 7-StringUpgrades:Fishman Fluence Modern pickup (push pull tone pot for voice switching)Brass Floyd Rose Sustain BlockChrome KnobsGlow in the dark dots on side inlaysDunlop StraploksLet me know if you have any questions!
Title: Bernie Rico Jr. Jekyll 727 - Custom Handmade 7 String + Upgrades
